setting.name: @cmdName
setting.desc: The command set for every everyone that has access to it.

setting.name: @dbType
setting.desc: The database you want to store your houses in.

setting.name: @dbName
setting.desc: The Database Name for your MySQL.

setting.name: @dbHost
setting.desc: The Database IP/Host for your MySQL.

setting.name: @dbPort
setting.desc: The Port used to connect to your MySQL. (optional)

setting.name: @dbUnixSoc
setting.desc: The Unix Socket needed to connect to your MySQL. (optional)

setting.name: @dbUser
setting.desc: The Username used to connect to your MySQL.

setting.name: @dbPass
setting.desc: The Password used to connect to your MySQL.

setting.name: @guestkey
setting.desc: Whether you want Guest Key enabled or not.

setting.name: @tourit
setting.desc: Whether you want Tour it enabled or not.

setting.name: @guestlen
setting.desc: The length of the guest key.
